oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of U.S. Grant and Family
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cabinet card of General and President Ulysses S. Grant and Family at Mt. McGregor, taken June 19, 1885, a month before his death from throat cancer. The image may have been one of the many commercial images of Grant that circulated following his death and the publication of his enormously successful Memoirs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Grant, Ulysses S. (Ulysses Simpson), 1822-1885
